Mechanism of Action

Non-selective COX inhibitor see [[NSAID]] 1

Pharmacology

Half-life 2.5-8.5 hrs 1 Metabolised by conjugation

Indications

[[Pain Management#Step 1 - Non-opioids +/- Adjuvants]]

Dosage

15-30 mg IV/IM q6-24 hrs

Complications

![[NSAID#NSAID Complications]]
